CREATE MEMORY TABLE "PUBLIC"."USER_CUSTOMER"(
    "ISACTIVE" INTEGER,
    "CREATED" TIMESTAMP(6),
    "LAST_LOGIN" TIMESTAMP(6),
    "MODIFIED" TIMESTAMP(6),
    "EMAIL" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "ID" CHARACTER VARYING(255) NOT NULL,
    "NAME" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "PASSWORD" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "TOKEN" CHARACTER VARYING(255)
);

ALTER TABLE "PUBLIC"."USER_CUSTOMER" ADD CONSTRAINT "PUBLIC"."CONSTRAINT_6" PRIMARY KEY("ID");

CREATE INDEX "PUBLIC"."IDX_EMAIL" ON "PUBLIC"."USER_CUSTOMER"("EMAIL" NULLS FIRST);

CREATE MEMORY TABLE "PUBLIC"."PHONES"(
    "ID" BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY(START WITH 1 RESTART WITH 3) NOT NULL,
    "CITYCODE" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "COUNTRYCODE" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "NUMBER" CHARACTER VARYING(255),
    "USER_CUSTOMER_ID" CHARACTER VARYING(255)
);

ALTER TABLE "PUBLIC"."PHONES" ADD CONSTRAINT "PUBLIC"."CONSTRAINT_8" PRIMARY KEY("ID");

ALTER TABLE "PUBLIC"."USER_CUSTOMER" ADD CONSTRAINT "PUBLIC"."UK_EMAIL" UNIQUE("EMAIL");

ALTER TABLE "PUBLIC"."PHONES" ADD CONSTRAINT "PUBLIC"."UK_PHONES" UNIQUE("NUMBER", "USER_CUSTOMER_ID");

ALTER TABLE "PUBLIC"."PHONES" ADD CONSTRAINT "PUBLIC"."FKFUO8RKBHM9PJ6255PB1SCI4AF" FOREIGN KEY("USER_CUSTOMER_ID") REFERENCES "PUBLIC"."USER_CUSTOMER"("ID") NOCHECK;
